extendedInfo.description: A selection of "Panels" to style your Homescreen :o)PLEASE READ ALL DETAILS CAREFULLYRecommended for Nova/Apex launchers - Grid Size - 6X5Dock - DisabledHoriaontal Margin - NoneVertical Margin - NoneYou MUST have UCCW 2.1.2 or higher installed on your device or this skin WILL NOT work.MAIN WIDGET (4x3)Shows Time, Date, Location, Todays Weather (left icon), Tomorrows Weather (right icon) and Current ConditionColours of text and shapes can be edited. Unfortunately the colour of the weather icons cannot be changed :o(Six hotspots available MIDDLE WIDGET (4x1)Shows notification counts for Phone, Messaging and GmailColours of all shapes and the icons can be changed. The icons are Static Text 1, 2 & 3.Phone - Static Text 1Messaging - Static Text 2Gmail - Static Text 3Four hotspots availableBOTTOM LEFT WIDGET (2x2)Can show three apps of your choice. Change the Text and hotspot to whatever app you want. Colours of shapes can also be changedBOTTOM MIDDLE WIDGET (1X2)Shows battery level. Three hotspots available at the bottom, middle and top. Bottom hotspot is set as app drawer (nova) as default and middle and top hotspots are set as Open UCCW Editor. These can be changed to whatever you wantBOTTOM RIGHT WIDGET (2x2)Can show three apps of your choice. Change the Text and hotspot to whatever app you want. Colours of shapes can also be changedMain Panel & Middle Panel have a hotspot at the bottom right hand corner set as Open UCCW Editor for easy access to customisation. To change colours/text/hotspots for the bottom panels you will need to disable hotspot mode via UCCW and then tap on the widgets to access UCCW editor****This skin will only appear in UCCW after you place a widget on your homescreen. It does not appear in your app drawer or if you open UCCW from your app drawer****Adding skin to your homescreen1. Add a UCCW widget to your homescreen by long pressing the homescreen or browsing widgets in app drawer2. Select one of the Panel widgets from UCCW menu3. Resize before hitting "Touch Here" (This is so that the Hotspots will be correctly aligned)4. Hit "Touch Here" to load the skin If you have any problems or queries please do not hesitate to email meEnjoy and thank you :o)
